::DarkMouse::

"Blast, they crawled past the first set of autoguns." She ran over to 
a console on the other side of Paralysis. She pushed a few buttons 
and turned a few nobs and ran back to her console.  "If I can get the 
cannons to respond.....YES! ON line!" She programmed 4 sets of 
interior cannons to aim themselves at any maximal signature.  The 
cannons took focus on Stegotron and Dinobot.

She looked at the other monitor that was infront of Paralysis. She 
pointed to the screen.  "Hey, That bot is coming towards the bridge. 
Fire on him!" she said to Paralysis. "Oh, OK, Fire on him please."
She turned and went back to her screen.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, TrikeJacob@n... wrote:
> As soon as Stegotron steps inside the Predacon base entrense he is 
hammered  by the entrense autoguns. He drops to the floor and crawls 
past them. Dinotron follows right behind him. Then they get up and 
run down the hallway Triceradon and Ultracon went.
